alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 9:35PM EDT until April 03 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford to Williams and White River at Hazleton to Petersburg. .While flooding continues along much of the White River and East fork of the White River, levels have crested and are steadily beginning to fall. More precipitation is in the forecast and this will result in prolonged flooding including a secondary rise in levels bringing some locations back above flood stage by early to mid next week. Those with interests along area waterways should monitor forecasts for the latest information. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Williams. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.2 feet, State Road 450 just east of Williams is closed by high water. Low agricultural grounds flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 AM EDT Saturday was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
